title: For a comparative study of Nisibis and Vivarium, see Hervé Inglebert, “La formation des élites chrétiennes d’Augustin à Cassiodore

Inglebert notes that after 500, the secular patristic educational model disappeared, and that one had then the choice between a secular education or a monastic one. At Vivarium, in contradistinction to the case in the Benedictine monasteries, monks could spend the whole day (and sometimes the night) in the scriptorium.
